dt-api.name: buttons().nodes()
dt-api.summary: Get the button nodes for the selected buttons

type.returns: A jQuery object that contains the nodes for the selected buttons
type.description: Get a jQuery object that contains a reference to the nodes for the selected buttons.

dt-api.description: It can often be useful to have access to the DOM node of a button so you can manipulate it using directly jQuery or DOM methods. This method provides exactly that option.
